content: pattern across the top of the sock until the last two stitches the picked-up stitch between the heel and top of the sock and the stitch immediately prior to it then ssk now switch to the heel flap side of the sock knit all of the picked-up stitches through the back loop knit to the last three stitches before the top side of the sock then k2tog k1 gusset decreases gusset decrease round 1 work across the top of the sock in pattern on the heel flap side of the sock k1 ssk knit to end gusset decrease round 2 work across the top of the sock in pattern on the heel flap side of the sock knit to the last three stitches then k2tog k1 repeat these two row until there are 56 64 72 stitches in total 28 32 36 on the top of the foot and 28 32 36 on the sole foot for the foot the 28 32 36 stitches on the top of the foot will be worked in pattern as set on the leg and the 28 32 36 stitches on the sole will be knit in stockinette continue working in pattern as set until foot measures 4 5 5 5 5 cm 1 75 2 2 25 inches less than desired length toe toe round 1 decrease round k1 ssk k22 26 30 k2tog k2 ssk k22 26 30 k2tog k1 4 stitches decreased toe round 2 knit all stitches toe round 3 decrease round k1 ssk k20 24 28 two fewer than previous decrease round k2tog k2 ssk k20 24 28 two fewer than previous decrease round k2tog k1 4 stitches decreased toe round 4 knit all stitches knit in decrease pattern as set here alternating decrease rounds with knit rounds until 28 32 36 stitches remain then knit decrease rounds only until 16 20 24 stitches remain graft remaining stitches together weave in ends and block page 5
